No options:
```{r}
x = 1:10
x
```

echo=FALSE:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
x = 1:10
x
```

comment=NA:
```{r, comment=NA}
x = 1:10
x
```
comment='#', prompt=TRUE:
```{r, comment='#', prompt=TRUE}
x = 1:10
x
```

echo=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=4:

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=4}
y = 10:1
plot(x,y)
```
